publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2332 Sandra White: Glasgow University - Far From a Lonely Place to be on the Planet!—That the Parliament welcomes the groundbreaking publication of Study Glasgow, a guide to studying at one of the world’s top universities, in one of its exciting and dynamic cities, produced by Lonely Planet in collaboration with the University of Glasgow; notes that the guide is intended to give those considering undertaking a course at the university the chance to get a taste of what the city is like to live in, and congratulates the University of Glasgow for its significant rise in higher education league tables, making it an attractive destination to study for students from across the globe. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson*, Patrick Harvie*, Rob Gibson*, Bill Kidd*, Alasdair Allan*, Angela Constance*, Bob Doris*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-2332 Glasgow University - Far From a Lonely Place to be on the Planet! (lodged on 15 July 2008) Gil Paterson*
S3M-2332 Glasgow University - Far From a Lonely Place to be on the Planet! (lodged on 15 July 2008) Jamie Hepburn*
